content.en: Antibody modeling: Scientists have developed various algorithms that can predict the structure of antibodies and model antibody-antigen complex structures. These algorithms, such as RosettaAntibody, SnugDock, and Antibody i-Patch, use computer-assisted modeling and epitope prediction to accurately determine the characteristics of antibodies. However, there are still challenges in antibody-antigen docking and affinity prediction that need to be addressed.
content.da: Antistofmodellering: Forskere har udviklet forskellige algoritmer, der kan forudsige strukturen af antistoffer og modellere antistof-antigen kompleksstrukturer. Disse algoritmer, såsom RosettaAntibody, SnugDock og Antibody i-Patch, anvender computerassisteret modellering og epitop forudsigelse til nøjagtigt at bestemme antistoffers karakteristika. Dog er der stadig udfordringer med antistof-antigen docking og affinitetsforudsigelse, som skal løses.
